meanings.definition: To dismiss or terminate someone from a job or position.
meanings.sent1: The boss shitcanned the lazy employee for always being late.
meanings.sent2: After the project failed, the company shitcanned the entire team.
meanings.sent3: They really shitcanned him from the job after he messed up the presentation.
meanings.sent4: She felt like she was shitcanned into the unknown after losing her job.
meanings.sent5: The decision to shitcan him was swift and final.

meanings.definition: To discard or throw away something.
meanings.sent1: I had to shitcan the old magazines to make space for the new ones.
meanings.sent2: She decided to shitcan all the broken toys in the attic.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally shitcanned his homework instead of throwing it in the trash.
meanings.sent4: The clutter was finally shitcanned from the garage, making it tidy.
meanings.sent5: The decision to shitcan the old furniture was liberating.

meanings.definition: To be heavily intoxicated or drunk.
meanings.sent1: He got shitcanned at the party and couldn't even walk straight.
meanings.sent2: She always ends up shitcanned after a few drinks at the bar.
meanings.sent3: They were so shitcanned at the wedding, they danced on tables.
meanings.sent4: The friends got shitcanned and sang karaoke all night.
meanings.sent5: The group got shitcanned and laughed uncontrollably.
